Events that occurred on 30 November.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1932 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.
1947 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 112.
1953 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 141c.
1955 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 175.
1958 - Actor Gareth Jones dies.
1964 - El hobito, the first translation into Spanish of The Hobbit, is published.
1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien conducts an interview, published as "The Man Who Understands Hobbits".
1966 - Letters to an American Lady is released.
1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 345.
1987 - The Lost Road and Other Writings is published in the US.
1989 - The Treason of Isengard is published in the US.
1989 - Oliphaunt is published.
2014 - Tolkien's Great War (documentary) by Zander and Elliot Weaver is released.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Frodo and Samwise rest in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
